name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DiligenceVault - RFP Mgmt for Fund Managers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your Q/A Center and Document Library to respond to prospect emails, search content on the go or to complete web-based RFPs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Swift and effortless Q/A content search: This feature allows users to search for content seamlessly, ensuring quick responses to investor requests without the need to switch between tabs.

2. Q/A Content synchronization: This feature permits users to sync content to Q/A Center directly from the browser plugin.

3. Effortless document synchronization: DiligenceVault's browser plugin feature simplifies the process of syncing documents from the platform to Microsoft SharePoint, fostering collaboration and streamlining document management.

4. Advanced document search functionality: Browser pluginâ€™s document search feature allows users to search within the content of the documents, thus enhancing the overall effectiveness by providing the users with a comprehensive document retrieval solution.

Note: 
We offer document search as an extra feature for premium users who are subscribed to it.

DiligenceVault offers customized pricing and plans, and offers you tailored solutions that fit your business requirements.
